name: A pair of mechanical wings
data: It increases the users strength slightly.
It increases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users constitution slightly.
It increases the users wisdom slightly.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It increases the users charisma slightly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
